com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib

Class CardinalDirection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.AbstractGeoCoordinate
      • com.github.ruleant.getback_gps.lib.CardinalDirection

  • public class CardinalDirection
extends AbstractGeoCoordinate
    Class for formatting cardinal direction.
    Author:
    Dieter Adriaenssens

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected String formatValue()
      Format value.
      protected double getConvertedValue()
      Convert coordinate value according to segment.
      int getSegment()
      Determine segment : Northeast (SEGMENT_NORTHEAST) if angle is in range 0..90, Southeast (SEGMENT_SOUTHEAST) if angle is in range 90..180, Southwest (SEGMENT_SOUTHWEST) if angle is in range 180..270, Northwest (SEGMENT_NORTHWEST) if angle is in range 270..360.
      String getSegmentUnit()
      Get segment unit.
      protected void init()
      Initialize coordinate value range.
